channel.title: Neutral CW Suggestion
channel.description:
I have heard the suggestion of a neutral class that gets unlimited tornadoes like the old CW. It would be like the alch where all he has to do is live to the end of the game.
For his second ability you could keep it the same, give him a killing ability like alch, or give him something different.
This would be seperate from the new CW rework

item.title: Neutral CW Suggestion
item.dc:creator: Nerbins
item.description:
The instructions said “It has to be BD”, but since you specified this, I’ll give it a pass.

Read full topic

item.title: Neutral CW Suggestion
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
Very UP since sage does this already.

And IT DOESNT BYPASS REDIRECTION IMMUNITY MEANING BYE BYE CW TO A NK
